about.title: About Me
about.description: Full stack developer with 4+ years of experience building enterprise applications for the banking and consulting industries. Specialized in Angular, TypeScript, and Node.js, with hands-on experience in serverless architectures (AWS Lambda), process automation (RPA), and CI/CD pipelines. Currently leading development teams at TCS, setting technical standards and delivering scalable solutions.
